author: Mark Kaufman
title: The most important thing to know about social distancing
description: You're watching the numbers go up every day. Yet, mayors and governors around the nation have ordered Americans to stay inside. Sports are canceled. Birthday parties are canceled. The Rolling Stones tour is canceled. Pick-up basketball in parks, canceled. Whe…
content:
You're watching the numbers go up every day.
